steps.title: The 🧊 (ice) emoji is used when talking about ice.
steps.content: The 🧊 (ice) emoji is used when talking about ice. Need some more ice in your drink or want to go ice skating? Use this emoji to replace the word “ice” while texting. This is a fun and creative way to amp up your texting game. [1] X Research source “Can I have a Pepsi with light 🧊?” “Let’s go 🧊⛸️ this weekend!”

steps.title: The 🧊 (ice) emoji represents cold temperatures and feelings.
steps.content: The 🧊 (ice) emoji represents cold temperatures and feelings. Does it feel like a freezer when you step outside, or is someone's heart a bit cold? If so, it’s the perfect time to use this emoji! An 🧊 defines all things cold, so don’t hesitate to send it to a friend when you're freezing your booty off (or they’re being cold to you). [2] X Research source “It’s FREEZING outside! 🧊🥶🧊” “You don’t have to be so rude 🧊😔” Pro tip: Try pairing an 🧊 (ice) emoji with other snow-related emojis like ☃️ (snowman) and ❄️ (snowflake) to really say “brrrr!”

steps.title: The 🧊 (ice) emoji describes something that’s cool or laid-back.
steps.content: The 🧊 (ice) emoji describes something that’s cool or laid-back. If you think something or someone is pretty chill, don’t hesitate to use this emoji! Use an 🧊 (ice) emoji when talking about someone with cool vibes or a laid-back situation. “Did you meet Abby? She’s pretty great 🧊✨😍” “The first day was 🧊. Nothing eventful happened, but I’m sure it won’t stay that way 😂😅”

steps.title: The 🧊 (ice) emoji may be code for methamphetamine.
steps.content: The 🧊 (ice) emoji may be code for methamphetamine. Drug dealers and users often use code when texting about drug sales or usage. Most commonly, an 🧊 (ice) emoji is the signal for methamphetamine. [3] X Research source This usage is most popular on dating apps, specifically Grindr. It can be used by itself or in this emoji code: “🍦🍨🧊🧪🪟” [4] X Research source Meth can also be disguised as this line of emojis: “🔮💙💎🧪” [5] X Research source Methamphetamine is a highly addictive stimulant that affects the central nervous system. It’s a white, odorless crystalline powder that can easily be dissolved. [6] X Research source

steps.title: The 🧊 (ice) emoji could be code for cocaine.
steps.content: The 🧊 (ice) emoji could be code for cocaine. This emoji is sometimes used by itself or with other emojis when someone is looking for or wanting to sell cocaine. Drug dealers or users can send an 🧊 (ice) emoji alone or in this coded line of emojis: “❄️🌨️⛄💎🎱🔑😛🐡” [7] X Research source In some instances, the 💎 is replaced with 🧊. Cocaine is an addictive stimulant drug that’s typically injected or snorted. [8] X Research source

steps.title: The 🥶 (cold face) emoji references freezing or unpleasant conditions.
steps.content: The 🥶 (cold face) emoji references freezing or unpleasant conditions. Maybe it’s super chilly outside, or someone just did something that wasn’t cool. Either way, if something gives you goosebumps, use this emoji! [9] X Research source “It’s so cold in here 🥶 Can you turn the heat up?” “He did what?! Yikes 🥶”

steps.title: The ❄️ (snowflake) emoji describes something pretty and delicate.
steps.content: The ❄️ (snowflake) emoji describes something pretty and delicate. Perhaps you’re discussing the beautiful snowflakes falling from the sky, or maybe you’re talking about a friend who’s bailed on you more than once. In either instance, using the ❄️ (snowflake) emoji is appropriate. Pair it with other winter emojis to showcase your love (or hatred) of winter, or use it to describe someone unique or flakey. [10] X Research source “I can’t wait for the ❄️ to come! Want to build a ⛄?” “Ugh, she’s crying over that? But that’s nothing! 🙄❄️”

steps.title: The 🍨 (ice cream) emoji depicts a delicious frozen treat.
steps.content: The 🍨 (ice cream) emoji depicts a delicious frozen treat. Are you in the mood for a creamy chilled dessert? If so, this emoji is perfect! Simply use it to replace the word “ice cream” in a text or let it follow a message talking about the delectable treat. “Want to get some 🍨 after school? My treat!” “Vanilla is the superior ice cream flavor 🍨 Try to prove me wrong 😜” Pro tip: The 🍨 (ice cream) emoji can be used interchangeably with the 🍦 (soft ice cream) emoji. Know that the 🍨 (ice cream) and 🍦 (soft ice cream) emojis can also be used when talking about meth.

steps.title: The 🍧 (shaved ice) emoji resembles a snow cone.
steps.content: The 🍧 (shaved ice) emoji resembles a snow cone. Ready for a cool treat on a hot summer’s day? Well, this emoji is the one to use! Replace the words “shaved ice” or “snow cone” with a 🍧 (shaved ice) emoji, or tag it at the end of a message where you’re dying for a yummy cold dessert. [11] X Research source “There’s a new 🍧 place by the park! Want to check it out?” “You know what we need on a hot day like this? 🍧🍧🍧”

Looking for a way to spice up your texting game and look super cool? Try using some of these emoji combinations! You could even play a game with your friends or crush to see if they can “break the code” of the story. Copy and paste the combinations, or use them as inspiration for your own: 🏒🧊⛸️ = Ice hockey 🧊⛸️ = Ice skating 🧊☕ = Iced coffee 🧊👸 = Ice queen 🧊🩸 = Cold-blooded 🧊🥶💙 = Cold hearted 👧👧🧊⛄❄️ = Disney’s Frozen
